price: Kuro biara a Yasεe no no, na εwͻ εberε a yahyε ato hͻ a yenim (sε yεde bεsεe no).
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
